net.dean.jraw.managers

Class AbstractManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dean.jraw.managers.AbstractManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkAccessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountManager, InboxManager, ModerationManager, MultiRedditManager, WikiManager

    public abstract class AbstractManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkAccessible
    This class serves as the base class for all "manager" classes, which have control over a certain section of the API, such as multireddits, wikis, or the inbox.

      • genericPost

        protected RestResponse genericPost(HttpRequest r)
                            throws NetworkException,
                                   ApiException
        Executes a generic POST request that returns a RestResponse. Used primarily for convenience since most endpoints that modify something are POST requests, and also for automatic error handling.
        Parameters:
        r - The request to execute
        Returns:
        A representation of the response by the Reddit API
        Throws:
        NetworkException - If the request was not successful HTTP request.
        ApiException
